prereq.p: Make sure that you have your username, password, and the name of the server to which you want to connect.

context.p: Once you are logged on, you can log off and disconnect from a particular project without closing . Logging off without closing the application is helpful if you plan to log on again using a different username and password.
context.note: You might automatically be logged off after a period of inactivity.

step.cmd:
To open , click Start All programs
.
step.info: You will see the Login Screen.

step.cmd: In the dialog box, do one of the following:

choices.choice: Log on using your Windows user account by selecting the Windows selection button.

step.cmd: In the directory field, enter the name or IP address of the main server.
If you are required to log on with supervision, your supervisor must provide a username and password.
To log off, click the Home tab and then click Log Off button.
